|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320EBTI-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9812G6JH-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "XDX-RN502J V2.0" and "1022" is silkscreened on the board.
The manufacturer of this device is almost certainly [http://sztianhao.com Shenzhen Century Xinyang Technology Co., Ltd]. :They probably sold this under various brands, [https://www.etradeasia.com/supplier-271828/Shenzhen-Century-Xinyang-Tech-Co-Ltd.html perhaps including widemac, Skylink, Tianhao, and Blueway]. '''widemac''' is the primary brand used by this company<!-- AFAICT -->, the brand primarily used on their web site, and is synonymous with this manufacturer.
As this board is used by numerous sub-models from this company, this is kind of a catch-all entry for them.
===Rebrands and similar products=== * The Bococom TH-R300W board shares the same board text. * This device shares the same board ID as the [[DealExtreme 92141]]. * The text on the board ("XDX-RN502J") is similar to text on the [[Winstars WS-WR511N1]], which is almost certainly another '''widemac''' product. * For '''widemac''' products, the '''SL''' / '''WD''' [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806201540/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=134 R7201], [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806142835/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=132 R7202], and [https://web.archive.org/web/20160806143120/http://sztianhao.com/prodetial.php?id=133 R7203] likely share similar boards. *The [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/widemac/sl-r7205 OpenWrt wiki] entry notes the R7205 as using this board (Aceex 22NRY, CD-R King 3G-52). * The [https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/ '''Resau Libre''' wiki] notes the R7205 as using a board silkscreened with "XDX-RN502J".
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/widemac/sl-r7205 "Widemac SL-R720X" on the OpenWrt wiki] (<small>[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/unbranded/xdx-rn502j Previously on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki here]</small>) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=158105 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=82160 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (w/ images) *[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=61162 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums again] *[https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/ On the '''Reseau Libre''' wiki] :[[SkyLink SL-R7205 (XDX-RN502J)]] (Widemac) :[[SkyLink SL-R7206 (XDX-RN502R)]] (Widemac) - [http://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/Bococom-DWR150/ ''Bococom DWR-150'']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/widemac/widemac_sl-r7205 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/widemac/sl-r7205 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = The device is sometimes also referred to as XDX-RN502J; Image build disabled in master with commit d7d46da938e3 }} Please insert instructions here
